comprehensive_overview: PyOpenCL lets you access GPUs and other massively parallel compute devices by using the Open Computing Language (OpenCL). The package is built on top of the OpenCL C API and enables Python scripts to easily make full use of compute devices like GPUs, TPUs, and other accelerators.
core_features: Provides Python bindings for OpenCL API
Enables parallel computing on GPUs and other devices
Integration with numpy arrays for data manipulation
